inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients will then be immediately placed in supine while maintaining 15 degree left lateral tilt.

inclusion.criterion: Co-loading of 1000 ml ringers lactate solution will be initiated at the start of spinal anaesthesia using a pressure bag and it will be completed within 10 min.

inclusion.criterion: Immediately after the spinal injection, phenylephrine infusion will be initiated at a rate of 25 µg/min and it will be titrated to maintain maternal SBP within 20 % of baseline.
